message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $170 is my bottom line. If you're unable to meet that price, I understand, but I'm confident I can find another buyer at that price point.
